title.label: Words can‚Äôt begin to comprehend what I feel

content.label: I find this game to be so much fun, when I was younger I used to play with my friends and ‚Äúfuse‚Äù with each other, Then when I heard there was a GAME, my dreams came true, I just have one problem, this game lags for me, a lot. I don‚Äôt know if it is just me, but from all the reviews I have seen it doesn‚Äôt seem to be the case. So, maybe it‚Äôs my own device. I just want to clarify though that it wasn‚Äôt always laggy, at first the first few levels of the Indigo Zone was fine, it was fine until I ventured into the ancient Gem War Strawberry place. That‚Äôs when it really started, anyway. I want to be able to enjoy the game, but I really can‚Äôt with all the lag, it has even caused Pearl‚Äôs Spear Throw to just disappear mid-throw, it has also caused me to stop getting lucky attacks. I love this game so much, and I don‚Äôt want it to end because I have a problem with the lag. So yeah, other than that, the game‚Äôs story is amazing, I love the art style, and I hope this gets fixed. :)

Overall, I didn‚Äôt have the console to play save the light, but this game definitely is still worth it. Though many bugs can be found, such as pausing when an attack is in session freezes the attack. And other bugs can ruin the experience. Also, the fusion mechanic is cheap, Alexandrite can‚Äôt even kill many of the groups of enemies in the last world. Maybe add Smokey quarts, opal, sugilite, or others. Otherwise this is a great game overall.

content.label:
THIS GAME IS AMAZING! I HAVE PLAYED IT FOREVER! There‚Äôs just something about it that makes it SO fun. But I DO have 2 issues, neither of which matter THAT much, but still. 
1. The fusion mechanic is cheap af. The ONE fusion is Alexandrite. That‚Äôs it. Wait wait wait, now I‚Äôm not saying that‚Äôs lame. It‚Äôs amazing! OMG ESPECIALLY THE FIRST TIME I USED IT! But it‚Äôs Only Alexandrite, and she‚Äôs reduced to nothing but a Super attack.
2.Garnet is TOO OP. Diamond Mode World 5 Gauntlet is the ONLY thing that can challenge my Garnet with an ATK of 39! U read correctly, THIRTY NINE!

P.S. If you want to skip the intro, just double tap the home button(or do whatever u do to open the app selector screen to instantly go into apps still open)& then go back in, the game glitches for a second and the intro ends immediately(it works for me atleast, if it doesn‚Äôt work for u, or if ur on a computer....sorry)Combine this with a setting so your phone doesn‚Äôt power off when u leave it alone and u can play hours of Attack The Light without turning it off ONCE. 
P.P.S. If I had to ask for 1 thing, PLZ HAVE LOTS OF DIFFERENT BATTLE MUSIC, and Special music for the Gauntlets, the Secret levels, the bosses, and 1 special one ONLY for the FINAL BOSS! ADD THIS PLZ!
